alert.note: Alert for Chester; Delaware; Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:47PM EDT until August 12 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Montgomery County in southeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Chester County in southeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Delaware County in southeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 647 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lionville, or 9 miles northwest of West Chester, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Norristown, Phoenixville, West Norriton, East Norriton, Downingtown, Collegeville, Royersford, Trappe, Pughtown, Bryn Mawr, Trout Lake, Radnor Township, Lionville-Marchwood, Valley Forge, Glenmoore, Paoli, Chester Springs, Newtown Square, Lionville and King Of Prussia. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 303 and 331. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 331. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 9 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
